programme.desc: Gordon challenges the teams to cater a school graduation ceremony before they face another star-studded dinner service. With certain hopefuls bent on sabotage, which team will emerge victorious?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: After a protein test challenge, the teams gear up for another stressful dinner service, this time attended by Gordon's mother Helen. One team finishes way in the lead, but which of the hopefuls will be taking the fall this week?

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the transformation of a beat up '55 Oldsmobile into a classic custom and takes on a Henry J chop top. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel makes the ultimate shop van out of a 1949 International milk truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a 1948 Packard into a street cruising led sled.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel let's loose on an abandoned 70's trike kit and works his magic to turn the naysayers into believers.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a 1923 C-Cab and a client with hoarder tendencies. Pulling out all the stops, Ian attempts to create a vintage style tow truck.

programme.title: Andromeda: And Your Heart Will Fly Away
programme.desc: When a long lost love returns, Tyr disappears from the ship to protect her from an assassin.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Unconquerable Man
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where Dylan died and Gaheris Rhade is trying to reform the Commonwealth.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The group that attacked the Andromeda during the first Commonwealth charter signing returns to wreak more havoc.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Dark Backward
programme.desc: Trance runs through a number of different scenarios, trying to find one in which her crewmates don't die.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Risk-All Point
programme.desc: A more powerful Andromeda ship explodes due to likely sabotage, forcing Dylan's crew to save them.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Right Horse
programme.desc: Beka endangers both her crew and an entire planet when a former love shows up.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: Jim Donnelly was a hard-working family man living a quiet life in suburban Auckland. For 20 years he’d worked as a scientist at the Glenbrook Steel Mill, south of Auckland. On the 21st of June 2004, he simply vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Girl in The Ditch
programme.desc: When 12 year old Agnes Ali'iva'a drowned in a ditch in 1992, the police initially thought her death was accidental. It was four years before public and political pressure forced police to re-investigate her death.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Ivan Milat: The Backpacker Murders
programme.desc: The backpacker murder case in the Belanglo State Forest, south west of Sydney, has entered Australian criminal folklore.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Anita Cobby Murder
programme.desc: In February 1986, nurse Anita Cobby, a former entrant in the Miss Australia quest, is walking home from Blacktown station in Sydney's outer-western suburbs. A Holden sedan pulls up and Anita is dragged into the vehicle.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Moira's star performance in the Gungellan musical is overshadowed by personal tragedy. Meanwhile, Marcus is dangerously obsessed with tracking down Ingrid.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Drovers Run faces its biggest crisis ever, and only a massive cattle drove will save Drovers from financial ruin, but have they left it too late? The search for Ingrid continues and a massive grain silo explodes with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Tayler's mum Jane comes back to Drovers but Tayler doesn't want to see her; Ingrid moves in with Marcus; Lily tells Frank she wants to live with her mother.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Tess Silverman arrives in the country after nearly 20 years in the city with dreams of selling off her share of the family ranch, Drovers Run.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Ducks On The Pond
programme.desc: Tess tries to realize some cash from Drovers Run without hurting Claire. One of the shearers Claire hired disappears; did he leave because his wife was in labor, or was he murdered?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Don't Mess With The Girls
programme.desc: It's time for the annual rodeo. Claire wants to ride Jack's horse Sirocco to a championship, and Tess tries to get Becky to report being raped.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Higher Power
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission - convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Who's the Boss
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a run away fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Brother
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk hold the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: San Pedro Prison, La Paz, Bolivia
programme.desc: Imagine a prison so fierce that guards stay outside for fear of their lives. Inside, the prisoners are in control: murderers, violent offenders, drug bosses. The inmates rule and anarchy prevails. Only the strongest survive this lawless place.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Dallas County Jail, Dallas. Texas, USA
programme.desc: The Dallas County Jail in Texas - a supersized facility with beds for 7,100 inmates. The biggest threat in the prison? Turf wars. With the surplus of inmates, there is less space to divide up between them, leading to relentless gang warfare.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Sofia Central Prison, Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: With a crumbling foundation fit for demolition, Sofia Central prison is inhospitable for anyone, including criminals. With multiple prisoner cells, bunks stacked 3 high and horrid isolation cells, prisoners live idly behind bars for 23 hours a day.

programme.title: Jail: Ultimate Fighter
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail: International Police
programme.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process. A man claims to be part of the "international police".

programme.title: Jail: Hopeless Hooker
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail: Hot Tied Whiner
programme.desc: After being arrested for domestic violence, a man is placed in restraints. An intoxicated man picks a fight with inmates over their hometown. A woman is arrested for assaulting theater guards.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: King of Kings
programme.desc: Joel claims he is a king looking for his queen. He says that him and Jerrica would succeed if she would just fall in line in his kingdom. Jerrica says she can no longer accept Joel’s list of rules and take his verbal abuse. She is ready to walk away.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Young Love
programme.desc: Anissa and Ma’lik have been together for 9 years and they have endured a lot of heartache due to Ma’lik’s cheating and dishonesty. Ma’lik says he’s not the same man he used to be and he’s trying to keep his family together..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smart and Stupids
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off with...

programme.title: Operation Repo: First Class Clown
programme.desc: Matt and Froy are sent on a wild goose chase around LA for a mini-van, and when they find their debtor selling contraband out of the trunk Matt is further convinced that Lyndah has been scheming against him.

programme.title: Operation Repo: El Prisionero
programme.desc: Lou and his cousin Rob face trouble on the job when a debtor makes shocking claims to police about the newest member of the Pizarro clan. Plus, will a repossession from a well-connected socialite end with Matt and Froy riding into the sunset?

programme.title: Operation Repo: All the Wrong Moves
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia try to repossess a car from a yuppie with a flair for the arts and for mayhem, Sonia, Matt, and Froy reclaim some unusual equipment from an overgrown hippie with some long hair and a short temper, and Matt and Sonia interrupt a house party..

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt & Froy Auto Recovery
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia make their way to a home in the hills to clean a germaphobe of his car. Then, it's Matt and Froy's big repo. Having left the company to start their own, they head out after a high-end exotic car from outside a mansion.

programme.title: Operation Repo: We Weren't Informed
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy end up on one of the weirdest repos they've ever encountered when a white cargo van unleashes a wave of workers. Then, Lou, Sonia, and Rob go green when they find they learn the Mercedes Benz they are after has been converted.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smoke, Lead, and Alcohol
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy venture into one of the city's most dangerous neighborhoods, only to find a debtor ready to defend his ride by pumping it full of lead, with no concern for who gets caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Rolling Away
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy have to push away a debtor while trying to push a classic car up a hill and onto the flatbed. And later, Matt and Froy head out on a repo for a BMW, but when the camera guy refuses to leave the car and Matt's lunch starts to...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Up Up and Away
programme.desc: First, it's up, up, and away, for Lou, Froy, and Matt. All of their skills are tested when they attempt to take down not one, but two hot air balloons. Then, Lou and Froy find themselves in the wrong part of town, repo'ing a sports car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Go Big or Go Home
programme.desc: Fuming over Froy's departure, Matt loses his temper on a dominatrix and her client and packs his bags to return to LA.? Down two repo men, the pressure is on Ronnie and Carlos, who interrupts a couple in the middle of their less-than-holy matrimony.

programme.title: The Game: There's No Place Like Home
programme.desc: Malik has an epiphany upon returning to his hometown of Richmond. Tasha is reunited with Pookie, who helps her reconnect with her mother, Gladys.

programme.title: The Game: Derwin's About To Go H.A.M.
programme.desc: Derwin must suffer the consequences when he misses a routine block in a game that results in the Sabers starting quarterback, Kwan, being sidelined with a season ending injury.

programme.title: The Game: Party In A Box
programme.desc: Chardonnay throws a surprise party for Jason at her apartment thinking it'll be a good way to meet his friends.

programme.title: The Game: Fits And Starts
programme.desc: Tasha and Pookie awkwardly explore becoming more than friends.

programme.title: The Game: A Woman's Right To Choose Herself
programme.desc: Tasha struggles with her decision to carry Melanie and Derwin's baby in light of her budding romance with Pookie. Meanwhile, Jason offers financial help to Chardonnay and ends up giving her more than he bargained for.

programme.title: The Game: Breakthrough. Breakdown? Break-Through
programme.desc: An unhappy Melanie does some soul searching and concludes that she wants to finish her residency at John Hopkins.

programme.title: The Game: Let Them Eat (Cup) Cake!
programme.desc: While Melanie is away interviewing for a residency position at Johns Hopkins in D.C., Derwin does everything he can to avoid returning to an empty home.

programme.title: The Game: Cold Swine Sucks...And So Does Falling In Love
programme.desc: Tasha reads a text message on Pookie's phone and finds out he's been living with another woman. Meanwhile, due to the urging of Melaine, Derwin pushes Irv to explore a new contract offer in D.C.

programme.title: The Game: Move Trick, Get Out Of The Way
programme.desc: Melanie and Derwin butt heads during the Sabres champsionship game week while Malik gets in a heated dispute when picking Jenna up from rehab.

programme.title: The Game: The Championship Game Episode
programme.desc: In the season finale, after winning the champsionship game, Derwin and Melanie settle on a resolution to their potential long distance relationship.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Ladder
programme.desc: A large family in Shrewsbury, MA, has been living with a spirit for the last 40 years. To most of the siblings, the entity is menacing and evil, but Sandy seems to have a different connection.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Hillary and her nine-year-old son Hunter are being harassed by a shadow presence in their Victorian home in Newburgh, Indiana. Trap doors in the basement reveal artifacts from a bygone era, and the clients have recorded persistent strange noises.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Requiem
programme.desc: A young woman named Kristy has been haunted in her own bedroom since she can remember. Now it's up to Ryan and the crew to help Kristy before she's overwhelmed by the entity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lost Souls
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/medium Michelle Belanger investigate a Pennsylvania home; where a mother named Kathy and her son Michael have both felt the presence of a young boy and hear voices calling, "Mom?" but no one is there.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fury
programme.desc: Kathy, her two daughters and her new husband, "Farmer" thought they had the perfect, quiet life deep in the mountains of West Virginia.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier

programme.title: World's Greatest: Jungle Animals
programme.desc: Encounter gorillas and orangutans, killer tree-dwelling pythons, delightful monkeys, awe-inspiring tigers, and millions of land-dwelling red crabs in Australia, the islands of Southeast Asia, Africa, and the Amazon.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Iconic Buildings
programme.desc: In construction, only a few buildings can be groundbreaking. Vastly different in shape, size, and function, these diverse buildings prove there is no recipe for greatness, just the fundamental ingredients of vision, bravery, and imagination.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Forest Animals
programme.desc: Forest Animals gets up close with bears, koalas, moose, wolves, weaver ants, and Tasmanian Devils. This episode roves dark forests floors and soars above vast canopies of green in America, China, Laos, and Australia.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coasts
programme.desc: Along coasts, one element ends and another begins. No two days are ever the same on a coastline: the only thing that remains a constant is the timeless power of the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the world’s greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: Arthur: Pets and Pests/Go Fly a Kite
programme.desc: There's a mouse loose in the Read home! And D.W. wants it gone…NOW! When traps fail, Arthur enlists the help of an expert mouse catcher. While playing in the park, Binky, Muffy, and Ladonna stumble upon an abandoned kite.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Breathless/The Fright Stuff
programme.desc: Will Buster's friends treat him the same after they learn he has asthma? Prankster have arrived in Elwood City--just in time for the "Scare Your Pants Off" costume party! It's boys vs. girls in what becomes a great big battle of the pranks.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky's Music Madness/Brain Freeze
programme.desc: Everyone loves the Bang on a Can All-Stars, a funky experimental music group that's touring around Elwood City. Everyone that is, except Binky. A new ice cream shop has just opened up across the block. Will Brain's shop be able to survive?

programme.title: Arthur: Love Notes For Muffy/D.W. Blows The Whistle
programme.desc: When Muffy tries to bribe the judges at the school science fair, Francine and The Brain plot revenge. And D.W., a newly-deputized Junior Safety Officer, has a reputation for being a strict enforcer of the rules--well, OK, a tattle-tale.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster Isn't Buying It/One Ornery Critter
programme.desc: Aliens, conspiracy theories, the megatoad--Buster believes in everything, until his favorite show gets cancelled for false reporting. Dogs love Arthur! Well, except Carrot Cake. Can Arthur win over this picky pup?

programme.title: Arthur: Bully for Binky/Misfortune Teller
programme.desc: Is Binky Barnes really the most disgusting, nasty, horrible person on the planet, or is he just misunderstood? Next, what's got four sides and the answer to everything? Prunella's cootie catcher!

programme.title: Arthur: The Curse of the Grebes/Arthur Changes Gears
programme.desc: The Elwood City Grebes haven't won the Baseball Championship since 1918. But with the addition of three players, the title is finally within reach. Arthur finally saves enough money to buy the bike of his dreams!

programme.title: Arthur: Two Minutes/Messy Dress Mess
programme.desc: Power shifts in the Tibble household when the twins find out Tommy is two minutes older than Timmy. Ladonna's thrilled when Muffy loans her a beautiful recital dress, but a run-in with a painted bench creates a problem.

programme.title: Arthur: The Perfect Game/D.W.'s Furry Freakout
programme.desc: Francine is excited about a school project, but she's so obsessed with making it perfect that she can't seem to get anything done at all. When D.W. finds a stray kitten, it soon turns out to be a lot more than D.W. can handle.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: The IRA Conspiracy
programme.desc: During WWII, the IRA's "S Plan" aimed to bomb Britain, drawing German support to weaken the British. "Operation Green" and "Plan Kathleen" envisioned IRA aiding a German invasion of Northern Ireland, but both failed due to bungling and infighting.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: The Arajs Kommando
programme.desc: Viktor Arajs, a Latvian, played a significant role in the Holocaust, collaborating with the Nazis to eliminate Jews. Leading the Arajs Kommando, he orchestrated the killings of around 30,000 Jews. Arajs justified his actions as patriotic defense.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: Vidkun Quisling
programme.desc: Vidkun Quisling, once honored for diplomacy, turned traitor by collaborating with Nazis. His bid for power in Norway failed, relegated by Germans. Despite being named "fuehrer," his reign led to repression until his hanging post-Nazi defeat.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: The Devil's Due
programme.desc: During WWII, Greek Prime Ministers Tsolakoglou, Logothetopoulos, and Rallis collaborated with Nazi occupiers, imposing fees that caused a famine.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators: The Croatian Collaborator
programme.desc: Croatia grapples with its fascist past through figures like Dinko Sakic, once hailed as a hero but later convicted of war crimes. Leading the notorious Jasenovac camp, Sakic oversaw brutal atrocities against inmates.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Courtney & Isaak
programme.desc: Courtney broke up with Isaak, who she met online. He's doing everything to get her back. Beauty queen Cassidy Wolf joins Nev to get Isaak to leave Courtney alone for good.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Craig & Zoe
programme.desc: Craig's sister introduced him to a beautiful girl named Zoe on Facebook. After talks online of a future life together, things turn sour. Now he wants to know who he gave his heart to. (S3, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Nick & Melissa
programme.desc: Nick and Melissa fell in love at age 12 when they met on an online chat room. Now 18, Nick is ready to meet Melissa. But is Melissa the real deal or has Nick been entangled in lies? (S2, ep13)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Nev and Max discover that Dejay and Malik are being played by the same guy. Sparks fly as they discover just how explosive a love triangle can be. (S5, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Vince can't seem to escape his online-ex, Alyssa, whose stalking has caused his real life girlfriend, Liz, to break up with him. Nev and Max help Vince confront Alyssa so he can try to salvage a future with Liz.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antoinette & Albert
programme.desc: A year after meeting 'T-lights' on Instagram, 'instaceleb' Antoinette is ready to meet him, but he always brushes off the idea. Is he really the online celebrity he claims to be?

programme.desc: The situation forgets the plan at dinner, and then forgets he's on a TV show. And a text from back home rattles the roommates and threatens to blow the whole vacation up.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Family Vacation: Jersey Shore: Family Vacation Attack of the Killer Raccoons
programme.desc: Pauly scrambles to get Deena and Angelina on board with a family dinner before Nikki arrives. But a mob of raccoons almost foils his plan. Meanwhile, back in Jersey, Jenni is having some major fomo.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Louisiana Purchase
programme.desc: In Louisiana, Ton and Allen encounter some salty locals at a shipping crate auction, and navigate choppy waters at a boat auction. After spending a lot of cash, they find a tactical blast shield and a bass fishing boat.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE You Got Served
programme.desc: After a crushing defeat, the guys leave an auction empty handed and scramble to find new merchandise at a yard sale. But questionable antique tennis rackets and an ancient special effects box may not earn them a cent.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Flying Ton, Creeping Allen
programme.desc: When a group of thugs try to bully Ton and Allen out of a Chinatown auction, the guys fight back, leading to a violent showdown and the discovery of both a rare Bornean blowgun and special effects wire harnesses.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Catch My Drift?
programme.desc: The guys land a custom drift car and a luxury antiques unit that could have a one-of-a-kind pilot pistol from WWI. While trying to track down the provenance of the gun, Ton's lead foot gets them into trouble at their car sale.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Hall of Fame Game
programme.desc: Allen heads to an auction with Elle, while Ton and Big Sis revamp the shop to help bring in more customers. Allen unearths a Ouija board and a set of antique basketballs, and goes toe-to-toe with an NBA Hall of Famer.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Always Money in Philadelphia
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, the guys face a shady bidder with inside information and former NFL star Vince Papale in a battle for a vintage football passing machine and a colonial musket that could be worth huge money if it's real.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Space Cowboys
programme.desc: With the pawn shop history, Ton and Allen start the next chapter of their careers with a bang. They uncover an antique WWII firearm and a Russian cosmonaut space suit, which could be their biggest find to date...if it's real.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Risk & Reward
programme.desc: Ton & Allen arrive late to an auction. They uncover vintage bear traps and a bounty of street art. If the pieces belong to the artist, RISK, it could be their biggest score ever. If not, they'll be stuck with forged knockoffs.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Brew-Phoria
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go all in for an electric car, but with the batteries missing, a pricey refurb is their only shot at a profit. Will a home brewing system and high-end air rifles help soften the blow, or will they take a big loss?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Ramped Up
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go head-to-head with their former assistant, Carolyn, while Ton battles a bad back. The guys discover an automatic BB gun and, when negotiations to sell a stunt ramp go south, Allen faces a tough decision.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE The Unsinkable Ton
programme.desc: Unique finds lead the guys to some cool sales. They try to authenticate props from the film Titanic, Ton faces off with a rattler during a snakebite kit sale, and Allen gets into ice carving while unloading some chainsaws.

programme.desc: Zo'or kidnaps a comatose policeman in order to use the man's body as a 'vessel' in a consciousness transfer experiment that will allow him to 'test' the human survival instinct and cause havoc on Earth.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Time Bomb
programme.desc: While examining Ma'el's ship, Liam and Renee find a chamber and in it are some life pods and the persons are all dead except for one.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Fields
programme.desc: Liam investigates a mission run by the Church of the Companions when a friend of his disappears. Sandoval and the Taelons are concerned about "the fields" where something vital to the Taelons' survival is harvested.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Apparition
programme.desc: Liam investigates the suspicious death of a banker, which he saw in a dream. It seems to be an exiled Taelon spirit that is contacting him. Da'an berates Zo'or for his money and power hungry attitude.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: One Taelon Avenue
programme.desc: Joshua Doors is running his own technology development company and Renee goes undercover to find out what is going on. An artificial intelligence program of the Taelons that controls human minds seems to be acting on its own.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Abduction
programme.desc: A volunteer who was working to interpret an ancient message from Ma'el assaults Da'an and escapes through a portal. Sandoval helps Da'an avoid interrogation from Zo'or while they try to locate her.

programme.title: The Lost World: Finn
programme.desc: An experiment with new energy sources goes awry, launching Roxton, Challenger, and Marguerite 100 years into the future. They discover that the rest of the world has been ravaged by war.

programme.title: The Lost World: Suspicion
programme.desc: Finn joins the explorers at the Treehouse. A team of archeologists suffer disease, violence, and distrust after opening an ancient urn that may have housed a demonic spirit.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Imposters
programme.desc: The explorers seek out a portal, but are overtaken by a force that replaces Marguerite, Roxton, and Challenger with three demons. With an age of chaos impending, Finn must bring back her friends.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Elixir
programme.desc: Challenger tests his nutritional elixir, but the drink causes hallucinations of his wife and younger self to appear in the treehouse. The others must find a cure before his visions become deadly.

programme.title: The Lost World: Tapestry
programme.desc: Challenger is taken captive by a WWI transport pilot guarding a crashed plane full of stolen iridium ingots. He, Roxton, and Marguerite relive their deepest secrets, each connected to the cargo.

programme.title: The Lost World: Legacy
programme.desc: An old enemy returns with a powerful artifact that could give him total power over the plateau. Veronica believes that her mother's pendant is leading her back to her parents.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Horses For Courses

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Trouble And Paradise
programme.desc: Chloe turns 18 but rows with Jordan on her big night out. Meanwhile, Megan and Dylan travel to Spain, Mia confronts Maggie, and Amber gets ready for the Christening - but there are tears. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Outfits, Arguments And Ultimatums
programme.desc: Chloe and Jordan go to Spain, but love stays at home. Amber rows with Ste, Mia spends Father's Day in a huff, Dylan hates Megan's 18th birthday outfit and Naomi gives Raphael an ultimatum. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: It's All Over
programme.desc: There's more drama in store for the teen mums as Mia faces off with Erin, Amber and Ste try counselling, Chloe and Jordan take a break and Megan and Dylan's engagement party ends in tears. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: The Future's Bright
programme.desc: Megan wants a new baby, Mia has her first night out since Marliya was born and Chloe makes a decision about Jordan. Naomi gets mad when an unexpected guest shows up at Kya's party. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: New Beginnings
programme.desc: While Megan drops a baby bombshell on Dylan, Naomi moves on from Raphael. Meanwhile, Chloe and Jordan go house hunting, Mia sets her mind on marriage, and Ste tells Amber he's found love. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A defense team and cutting-edge forensic animators strategize to defend a young woman accused of murder.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A defense team and cutting-edge forensic animators strategize to defend a young woman accused of murder.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder by Design
programme.desc: Investigators question whether designer Gianni Versace was the random victim of a killing spree, or he knew the man who shot him to death.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Amanda Knox: The Untold Story
programme.desc: The story of Amanda Knox, an American exchange student who was convicted, along with her Italian boyfriend, Raffaelle Sollecito, of murdering Amanda’s British roommate, Meredith Kercher in 2007.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: In 1986, 21-year-old Mitzi Nalley was brutally murdered in her Austin, Texas home. Police arrested Jonathan Wayne Nobles, who confessed to the crime and was sentenced to the death penalty.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Thomas Capano, a successful Delaware lawyer lived a double life, a devoted family man while having affairs. When Anne Marie Fahey, one of these women, mysteriously disappeared police were at first stumped. Finally evidence led to Capano.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Major Briggs has no memory of the place he was taken, but now has an odd tattoo on his neck. Andy and Dick break into Little Nicky's files. Mike and Nadine begin an affair. Shelly and Bobby's love is strained. Evelyn asks James to kill her husband.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Windom Earle has taken his first victim in the deadly chess game. Audrey tells Bobby they have to save Ben from his civil war fantasy. Leo awakes and attacks Shelly, but Bobby is able to fend him off.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The police look for James in the Marsh murder. Bobby and Shelly tell Truman Leo escaped and Bobby reveals that he saw Hank shoot Leo the night the mill burned. Albert returns to Twin Peaks with information on Windom Earle.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Truman puts Hank in prison for the attempted murder of Leo, while Hank points the finger at Josie for the murder of Andrew Packard. Albert reveals that Josie shot Cooper. Ben enlists John Justice Wheeler to help him stop the Ghostwood plans.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Harry sinks into a deep depression after Josie's death. Josie's body holds more questions then answers. Norma's troubled sister, Annie, arrives in Twin Peaks. Wheeler and Audrey hit it off. Cooper's stalemate angers Earle.
